job_description:
Description

The resource will act as a senior subject matter expert (SME) in the analysis, support, and ongoing

operations of the Client's system.

Responsibilities Will Include

Analyzing, providing data and technical recommendations, and creating technical artefacts about

database schemas, queries, data extracts, reports and DB performance

Subject Matter Expert relating to database schemas, queries, data extracts, reports on any project

that requires is (eg. the Data Exchange Platform project)

Troubleshooting, testing and support of business registry functional releases, subsidiary applicationsbuilt on J2EE-based web portals & application servers, and standards-based web service implementations.
Mentoring and providing handson technical guidance and support to Tier 2 resources tasked with

resolving incident tickets pertaining to the client.

Development and support of Databricks reporting dashboards.

Experience And Skill Set Requirements

Technical Knowledge - 30%

Extensive hands-on experience with Catalyst based business registry and/or occupational registry systems and their related data models.
Extensive experience using Oracle databases & structured SQL-based query languages.
Proven ability to provide technical recommendations and create technical artefacts regarding database schemas, queries, data extracts, reports and DB performance while working within system and/or environment constraints.
Extensive hands-on experience working with an n-tier J2EE based portal and web application server environment including enterprise service bus, DataPower and standards-based web services.
Previous handson experience with applications built on IBM WebSphere Portal, IBM WebSphere Application Server and WSRP-based applications.
Experience developing and supporting dashboards in Microsoft Databricks

Documentation - 15%

Demonstrated knowledge and experience with creating architecture artifacts.
Demonstrated knowledge and experience with developing Technical and Application Design Documents
Documentation/knowledge transfer to full-time project technical staff.

System Analysis, Testing and Integration - 20%

Excellent analytical, problem-solving and decision making skills
Excellent verbal/written communication skills and interpersonal/negotiation skills.
Good understanding of systems environments, business analysis and change management.
Experience using and maintaining automated system testing tools such as Client UFT and Selenium
Familiarity and experience with testing web accessibility, WCAG 2.0 Level A & AA, as well as Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA) and related regulations (e.g. IASR)

Public Sector Experience - 5%

Understanding of Public Sector IT methodologies and standards
Knowledge of GO-IT Standards (GO-ITS) and Enterprise Architecture
Experience working in a highly complex, unionized and multi-stakeholder environment.
Understanding of Ontario Business Registry system (ONBIS) and business process, knowledge of Catalyst

Must Haves

Extensive hands-on experience with Catalyst based business registry and/or occupational registry systems and their related data models.
Extensive experience using Oracle databases & structured SQL-based query languages.

Experience developing and supporting dashboards in Microsoft Databricks
